Package com.infy.eng.messaging.kafka

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    KafkaConstants  
    KafkaConsumer
    This class acts as a consumer to consume the message that has been produced through Kafka framework
    KafkaEncoder  
    KafkaHandler
    This class helps to handle both the message sending and receiving process through Kafka framework
    KafkaPartitioner  
    KafkaProducer
    This class acts as a producer to produce the message through Kafka framework
    KafkaProperties  
    KafkaProperties.KafkaConsumerBuilder  
    KafkaProperties.KafkaConsumerProperties  
    KafkaProperties.KafkaProducerBuilder  
    KafkaProperties.KafkaProducerProperties  
    KafkaUtil  
    MessageTester
    This class serves as the test class for testing the Kafka messaging system.
